# PayBlocks Documentation

PayBlocks is a comprehensive website builder kit that combines PayloadCMS's powerful content management capabilities with shadcn/ui's modern components and shadcnblocks.com's extensive block library. This documentation will guide you through setting up, configuring, and extending your PayBlocks project.

## Table of Contents

- [Getting Started](./getting-started.md)
- [Environment Configuration](./environment-variables.md)
- [Authentication](./authentication.md)
- [User Roles and Permissions](./roles.md)
- [Custom Blocks](./custom-blocks.md)
- [Deployment](./deployment.md)
